metadata.title: CVE-2024-3863 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: The executable file warning was not presented when downloading .xrm-msfiles.*Note: This issue only affected Windows operating systems. Other operatingsystems are unaffected.* This vulnerability affects Firefox < 125 andFirefox ESR < 115.10.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
